data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
In the minute 1, Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tigres have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Toluca in the half of Tigres.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
In Nuevo Leon Tigres drive forward through Luis Rodriguez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Toluca throw-in in Tigres's half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Toluca.
Free kick Tigres.
In the minute 24, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Toluca a goal kick.
In Nuevo Leon, Tigres push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Toluca.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Tigres to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Toluca a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Tigres.
Tigres advance rapidly upfield but Fernando Hernandez Gomez blows for offside.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Toluca.
In the minute 34, Free kick Tigres.
Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
Luis Quinones with an assist there.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Tigres.
Toluca will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tigres.
Diego Gonzalez (Toluca) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 38, Great finish from Andre Pierre Gignac to give Tigres a 2-0 lead.
Andre Pierre Gignac (Tigres) has received a yellow card from Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Toluca to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
In the minute 41, Can Toluca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tigres's half?
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tigres's Guido Pizarro has been booked in Nuevo Leon.
In the minute 42, Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in Toluca.
Toluca make their first substitution with Alan Medina replacing Haret Ortega.
In the minute 46, Carlos Morales is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Universitario (UANL) with Diego Rigonato replacing Diego Gonzalez.
The home team replace Diego Reyes with Hugo Ayala.
In the minute 47, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Toluca just outside Tigres's area.
Tigres's Luis Quinones is on target but unsuccessful.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Toluca throw-in in Tigres's half.
In the minute 51, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
At Estadio Universitario (UANL), Adrian Mora has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 52, Own goal! Hugo Ayala scores in his own net to make it 2-1.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hugo Ayala for Tigres has been booked by Fernando Hernandez Gomez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 58, Tigres have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 59, Toluca have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nuevo Leon.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, Tigres needs to be cautious. Toluca have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Free kick in a good position for Toluca!
In the minute 71, He's off! Hugo Ayala is shown a second yellow card.
The home team have replaced Luis Quinones with Jorge Torres. This is the second substitution made today by Ricardo Ferretti.
Rubens Sambueza of Toluca gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 75, Tigres have a goal kick.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 78, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Nahuel Guzman.
Tigres's Nahuel Guzman looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
Free kick for Toluca in the half of Tigres.
Kevin Castaneda is replacing Raul Lopez for Toluca at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In the minute 82, Carlos Morales (Toluca) is making a fourth substitution, with Pablo Lopez replacing Antonio Rios.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Jonatan Maidana (Toluca) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 84, Toluca are pushing forward but Kevin Castaneda's finish is wide of the goal.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Tigres a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
In the minute 87, Throw-in Toluca.
Ball safe as Tigres is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Toluca throw-in in Tigres's half.
Eduardo Tercero is on a sub for Jesus Duenas for Tigres.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Tigres.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Tigres.
Toluca are in shooting range from this free kick.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Toluca in Nuevo Leon.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Nahuel Guzman returns to the field for Tigres after picking up a slight injury.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Carlos Salcedo is booked for the home team.
Ricardo Ferretti is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Universitario (UANL) with Juan Sanchez replacing Julian Quinones.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Nahuel Guzman for Tigres who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
